website_summaries.verdict: It’s hard to beat the stunning 4K video resolution, range of creative shooting modes, and versatility of the Dragon Touch time-lapse camera, especially considering its fairly low price.
pros: Features time-lapse, driving, loop recording, and slow-motion shooting modes
cons: While the WiFi connectivity works well, it would have been nice to have the option for Bluetooth connectivity, too

website_summaries.verdict: This camera offers a higher MP than others at this price range.
pros: Includes a 4X zoom and wide angle
Comes with a wearable remote control
Has a driving mode to be used as a dash cam
cons: This camera does not have the capacity to hook up an external microphone

customer_reviews.title: SO AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera back in december 2018 for a family christmas trip to Aruba! I was skeptical because of how low the price was but i'm so happy with the turn out!! The camera takes pictures, videos & slowmo's! It can with the case, batteries and all the different hook ups just like the picture showed! It did amazing in and out of the water! Couldn't have asked for a better camera! 20/10 would recommend! Here's a few underwater pictures from my trip!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Swanson

customer_reviews.title: great value for what all you get
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I use it on my drone seeing as I didnt like the one that it came with it very much. The light weight and simple attachments made it a snap to put the two together and didnt effect the flight time by more than 2 mins tops. I included a pic of what came with the camera out of the box and one of the camera on the drone. And one video of the slow motion capture feat. on the camera while on the drone. Looks amazing, really a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine gary

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality, Small and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Our family and friends used this camera for taking pictures while snorkeling. We were able to take pictures that we otherwise wouldn't have been able to. Taking pictures and videos were easy and transferring them to my computer was simple, too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely terrible
customer_reviews.text: Claims to be 4k video, yet the "4k" quality is worse than the video quality on my son's $30 tablet. Claims to be 60fps, but doesn't come even close to the 30fps on my phone. False advertising at it's finest.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Good videos and images
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. I was not expecting this would be as good as Go Pro, after I used it for first time the result was great. Accessories are good quality too. It’s really sweet that seller also provide screen protector. Love it so far. Would recommend it. Amazon compressed the video way toooooo much. The original video is way better than this.:-(
customer_reviews.author: Sailing

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace another camera that turned out to be a piece of junk. This camera has surpassed my expectations. It has great video and audio quality and is super easy to use. Seems rugged and the included case is truly waterproof. I used it in a pool and everything worked perfectly. I love the wrist remote but wish it was waterproof as well. The two batteries last about 1 hour each which gives me a good 2 hours of video time before needing to recharge. I love all the accessories and they so far have withstood excessive use. For the price, you really can't go wrong with this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Red HikerTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a GoPro alternative and was impressed right out of the box by it's quality. This camera shoots very sharp video at the 1080p 60fps the 4k I would recommend only using in a tripod but it isn't bad. Highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Matt&Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: The app to monitor the camera is AWFUL
customer_reviews.text: XDV is the app they recommend, it's wifi not bluetooth, and will not connect to the camera. It also crashes every time I try to exit the wifi choosing screen so I can't even follow their troubleshooting recommendations. DO NOT BUY. The app is not user friendly, to the point where I would hesitate to call it usable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap for a reason.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to record my Autocross runs, but found out quickly why its so cheap. First and foremost, the software on this thing is awful. Clunky interface, and options aren't very clear. Firing up this thing is pretty funny, as sometimes after pushing the On button it starts up right away, other times seems to take 30 seconds. The video quality reminds me of something you would see in the TV show COPs – dark and shaky. My advice, save your money and buy a GoPro. Just picked up a GoPro Silver 7 on sale, and glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Camera works perfectly for viewing my Koi & fish pond underwater in real time.
customer_reviews.text: I installed in this camera in a waterproof Lemotech project box with a clear cover. I brought the HDMI and USB wires up through a 1/2 inch PVC pipe to the surface of the pond. I then connected the HDMI cable to my TV by the pond. The USB cable acts as an on-off switch so I don't have to bring the camera to the surface and can leave it submerged all the time, except for cleaning the algae off of the clear plastic cover.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice action camera with good video quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera for action cam and dash cam purpose. I tried 1080p 30fps and recorded more than an hour video during day and night. Each 3 min video clip came out petty clear. And there's no lagging in recording. Night vision works good and captures image nicely. There is no color distortion I can tell. Sound is also acceptable. 1080p is good enough for my dash cam use. I don't think I even need to use 2k or 4k at all. I am glad I bought this Dragon Touch. By far this is the best one comparing to other 4K action cam I bought. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: jfw

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but you can not buy extra cases for the camera.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, but you can not buy extra cases for the camera. Battery life varies based on how you have it setup with resolution and or time lapse. I give it four stars since I can not buy extra cases for it.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley S Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is not user friendly, has almost no instructions and comes with all these attachments that are not labeled (so you have no idea how to use them). The minimal included instructions are on a tiny piece of paper and provide very little information. The screen on the camera is small, but view able. I didn't care for the camera, couldn't really figure it out and when trying to use it under water it was even harder to figure out, so I returned it. Not worth the money, you are better off getting a waterproof pouch for your phone to use under water.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Pangrazio

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Shenzen trash, terrible video and audio quality.
customer_reviews.text: "You get what you pay for." And when you pay for an action camera at 10% of the price of a GoPro, you get 10% of the camera. Just watch the video I took with it. Total garbage quality. Not even worth the $40 when your smartphone will do a better job. Skip this trash.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Can't edit video files!
customer_reviews.text: Adobe will not recognize the videos as valid files, so you can't import them into after effects or premier pro to edit and process the videos. You're stuck with what you capture. So now I have a ton of footage from a trip that I can't do anything with as there's a bunch of stuff that needs to be cut (the beginning where I turn on the camera and the end when I turn it off, etc. Update 2.1.18: customer service reached out and wanted to make things right. They didn't offer any solutions editing the video, I do give them bonus points for at least providing service after the sale. Added 1 star for service.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, no Playback and Bad App
customer_reviews.text: Well I was completely disappointed. The video quality was extremely good but seemed to skip as it recorded. The app was atrocious, couldn't connect to camera and when it did would lose connection and would not Playback videos in the app as it is supposed to. After downloading videos through app they play nothing , just still images on any device I view them on. Yes, I did format the SD.
customer_reviews.author: SKYLAR SIMMS

customer_reviews.title: Absolute GARBAGE video quality on all settings.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not necessarily for the 4K capabilities but just to have a handy b-roll camera for video projects when I dont want to lug around all my heavy equipment. I tried 4K 30fps and 1080p 30fps and the quality was absolute garbage. Notice in the picture (still frame of 4K 30fps setting) how it looks like someone put a watercolor photoshop filter on it. Total trash. Returning it. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Gahechi Esmichi

customer_reviews.title: It won't record for longer than 18 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a trial camera to record my motorcycle rides before spending the money for a Gopro. The reviews on this camera go back and forth. My reasoning for the 2 star is that every time that I have recorded one of my rides the camera will not record for longer than 18 minutes, and then it takes a few minutes then start recording again but for no longer than 18 minutes. The battery life is terrible also, and the battery charging dock will not fully charge the batteries. I've found out that the only way to get a full charge is to plug in a microusb cable directly into the camera to get a full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I thought the price was too good to be true, but at $45, I took the chance. My suspicions were correct. The photo and video quality is waaay subpar. No way I was happy using this and ended up returning. However, if you need an action cam and can't save up more money, I guess it's better than nothing. That said, I would suggest to the manufacturer that instead of including a ridiculous amount of accessories, to put some more effort into the camera. It's better the buyer be responsible to getting their own accessories than wasting so much plastic for a junk product.
customer_reviews.author: mitoboru

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all was broken
customer_reviews.text: Teribale product I opened it up and followed the instructions which is just pictures doesn't show you how to use attachments but I fully charged the batteries and nothing camera didn't even turn on I bought for a vacation and don't have time to get another one called customer service they said it happens all the time so there selling broken cameras pretty much and hoping you will just chalk it up
customer_reviews.author: Justine Stanley

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for it
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and low quality! Stay away. Cannot handle speed or light changes. Used it for a day and the results were so poor I immediately sent it back. Surely the good reviews are fake!
customer_reviews.author: R. Shoshan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful action camera
customer_reviews.text: Such a small device and so many accessories to put it anywhere convenient. I had trouble getting the micro card into the slot - it wouldn't stay seated. I spoke with customer service, they had me try a few things to no avail. So, they sent me a new camera. It works great! 4 stars because, for even a working slot, the card is tough to get in and out. Keep tweezers handy until a better solution is engineered. I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LGH

customer_reviews.title: Are you worried if it has enough sound?
customer_reviews.text: I was. I wanted the 4k picture quality as well but at 1080p I think it works fine. Something you may not know, this communicates wirelessly with your smart phone for ease of operation. I did not know this and it's a very nice feature. UPDATE: No external mic. After just a few months it now has sun spots and terrible sun glare images within new videos.
customer_reviews.author: olajoe

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Value One Shortcoming if Trying to Use as Webcam - Microphone not Recognized
customer_reviews.text: All and All a very good value with plenty of accessories. Has settings to be used as a Dashcam too. During COVID-19 I tried to use as Webcam and Windows could find the Camera but could not use the microphone. I wrote their technical support who responded immediately stating that was a common complaint and not possible to use microphone. That is not really its use, but other sports cameras do have microphone access via USB when in webcam mode. Something to keep in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Holden Caulfield

customer_reviews.title: Cheap defective better options available
customer_reviews.text: Product was unusable! It would not boot up past loading screen. Dragon touch Costumer service only resolution was return it wait for refund and rebuy a long process to possibly get another cheap non working item. If I could do 0 stars it would be item feels very cheap like your going to break it as you open the battery box. Returned and bought something better
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: I love this little thing!
customer_reviews.text: I needed an underwater camera for GISH (an international scavenger hunt I play every year), and decided to see if this one was any good for the price. It came with more mounts/pieces than I even know what to do with, two batteries, the charger, remote bracelet, etc. The only thing you need is a micro SD card to go with it. This is my picture from GISH, "camping underwater" in a pool. My picture is much more clear than a lot of the other submissions I saw for this item. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Britasaurusbex

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price on recording action videos
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera to record videos of my rides and get photos as well. Not sure of those who have posted on youtube about this camera if they know how to even work a camera. But this records great! These were recorded in 1080p at 30 FPS. Be sure to use the cable, (USB), that came with your camera when connecting it to your PC. It is a special designed cable that allows you to share the camera with your PC as a USB device, a PC camera, or just charge it from your USB port on your computer. More photos added taken from the mode of Camera. This camera kicks butt !!!!
customer_reviews.author: jade razor

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: We have not used the camera yet, this review is only of our purchase experience. The images and description made it appear you were purchasing the camera with all the accessories pictured. To our disappointment, when the item arrived there were no accessories. We had to purchase them separately. I feel the vendor is being misleading by including images of the extra accessories that are not included with the purchase. It should be noted in the description *accessories pictured not included.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie L.

customer_reviews.title: I was really hoping.... but, terribly disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: This camera worked the first 2 times, but after that it would just cut off or indicate it was recording but not record a thing. This was terribly disappointing since it was supposed to be recording as friends played with manatees in florida... only to return home, excited to see the video and have nothing. Dont trust a memory to this product!!
customer_reviews.author: O. S. Villa

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Product came as promised with all accessories and housing, etc. Also came on the day promised which was nice. Absolutely cannot beat this camera for the price. Quality is great, accessories are great as well. Only gripe is that it says 1080p resolution in the manual despite saying 4k on the product, but I honestly cannot tell the difference so.. I'm not upset. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Stark Media Group

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love This Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this camera. It came with almost every possible attachment with an extremely amazing image resolution compared to other cameras in the market where I had to purchase those separately. Simple and easy to operate and absolutely no regrets. I only wish I understood how to upgrade the firmware more easily. Maybe it’s perfect and there is no need to do so but would like to understand if there is some type of upgrade path that I should or should not be aware of. Overall though I am extremely happy with this product and has easily allowed me to move into the world of 4K video without the typical cost of doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Skywalker

customer_reviews.title: Junk!
customer_reviews.text: It's not the 4k! this camera calms to capture up to 60fps with 4k? clunky controls and navigation menu. comes with a bunch of useless mounts, also made from cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great Value but the app could be better
customer_reviews.text: For $50, you get a great opportunity to record high-definition video from a device where you don't have to worry about the weather impacting it. There are plenty of accessories to make this really a versatile video recording device. Believe it or not, one of my favorite features is the fact that I can plug it into a backup battery and record for an extended amount of time without having to worry about the batteries draining. This works well for recording kids sporting events from a tall tripod and not having to worry about running out of battery after an hour of non-stop filming. It would get a five star review if the app was better.
customer_reviews.author: Mr DIY & Mr Mom

customer_reviews.title: thanks. it sucks ass.
customer_reviews.text: don't buy it. i didn't expect much. i expected maybe a 720p cam, it was about 480p. it glitched a lot, it deleted the photos and videos without me asking it to, it broke 2 of my micro sd cards, etc. it sucks. don't get it, buy sm else. (update: i returned it and got a refund. if you want to see what the camera is like, check out Safiya Nygaard's video on wish tech products. it's not the exact same one as in her video, but it's pretty much the same.)
customer_reviews.author: zh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent versatile little camera
customer_reviews.text: Well, first I was surprised about how small the camera was and the fact that it doesn't weight hardly anything. I was also impressed on the ease of setting up the camera app which allowed me to easily control the camera. I haven't been able to test out the waterproof feature yet but the casing looks very capable so I'm anxious to try it out. This unit also comes with tons of adapters that I haven't been able to determine how I want to use them yet but can connect this camera to about anything. For this price point this is a great addition to my other cameras!
customer_reviews.author: S. Buford

customer_reviews.title: It is just ok.
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok. I purchased this for my son for his birthday present. He is 11 and when he went to record the battery died in less than 3 minutes. He grabbed the back up battery and it was the same thing. Pictures. They are ok but not what I would expect after reading all the reviews. Attachments. They have a lot. If you are going to buy this buy the case to go with it. If not, you will end up losing some of the pieces.
customer_reviews.author: sean f mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Water proof camera case closure is prone to failure
customer_reviews.text: For the price the camera itself is hard to beat and works as advertised. The zoom function is a bit delayed when operating but again for the price the camera itself is great. The one complaint I have (hence the rating) is that the waterproof case clasp is designed poorly and failed after only two uses. The case itself seems sturdy enough and the buttons all work appropriately but the small metal tab attached to the clasp failed. You can buy a replacement waterproof box for around 10$ so I might do that or maybe just go ahead and get the GO PRO.
customer_reviews.author: Don W. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Impressed by the features at the price
customer_reviews.text: As everyone else, I first looked at Hero when my 12-yr old athletic daughter asked for an action cam. Sure, there were good deals at Costco but nothing as cheap as this camera. So I figured out we would buy this one for her to get some experience with the technology, mounting, configuration, video files, etc. And it turns out that this is all she needs! Try it out, and even if it does not work out for you, you will have at least learned something that will be good to know/check when you will next buy that very expensive camera.
customer_reviews.author: ananymous

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Underwater Camera.
customer_reviews.text: I am by no means a photographer. I needed a basic underwater camera that is easy to use. I like the 170 degree wide angle and the WiFi connection. I love the price. I bought it mainly for underwater shots when we go on vacation. I want family shots and a camera that was good, but wouldn't break the bank. I've read through the instructions and they seem pretty basic, which is great for me. I did extensive research and read the reviews very carefully. I have not tried this out, but I am very eager to test it on our next vacation.
customer_reviews.author: L. Plummer

customer_reviews.title: Good starter camera
customer_reviews.text: The camera is tiny! It seemed a bit larger in the pic, but it’s about the size of a golf ball. My 8-year-old loved it! However, I’m glad I got a tripod to go along with it because without it, this would most likely be lost quickly, as it is very small. Came with a million pieces, was like a puzzle trying to figure out what each piece was for. Sound isn’t the best, but picture and video are good. Pretty cool that it connects to your phone with WiFi!
customer_reviews.author: Kproano

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera...
customer_reviews.text: Great price for what you get. No fancy case but those are cheap enough to buy to fit all the parts it comes with (different mounts and extra waterproof screen). This is my second Akaso cam pruchased and the Dragon has features similar to the EK7000. Remote view with the app or connect to the computer and use as a webcam.
customer_reviews.author: Ed C

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for an Amazing Price!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect all the extras that came with the camera. All kinds of attachments for mounting on just about anything. I plan to video a tiny cabin build, so this will be on a tripod or strapped to a tree most of the time. It also included two batteries and a CHARGER! I didn't expect an external charger. I thought I would have to charge each one in the camera. The manual is a little difficult to follow, but was able to get it figured out fairly quickly. Since it came with a waterproof case, I will also be taking some kayak fishing videos very soon!
customer_reviews.author: BJH

customer_reviews.title: EXCEPTIONAL VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: So this was bought to replace an aging GoPro, primarily for use while I ride my recumbent cycle. First, I was drawn to it by the price. Then I looked at the features. Thought it'd be an "okay" camera that would do what I wanted, but when it arrived, and I used it, wow! Does everything that my old GoPro did, does it better and clearer, and for a fraction of the cost. I am really impressed by this little camera.
customer_reviews.author: Mangy Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Seriously don't buy this, I know it's cheap but there's a reason. Battery life is horrible and if you keep a battery in it whether it's running or not it loses a charge. It only takes video in 30 minute bursts and the quality is horrible. I actually didn't even have sound on any of the video that I took and I was using a brand new SD card. Just look the other way
customer_reviews.author: Gillette584

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical and then I charged up the batteries and loaded my memory card up and turned it on and I was blown away by the clarity of the screen and how easy it was to travel thru the settings and start up from being off is quick so you wont miss that moment. I took it with me all day so far recording all in 4k to see how battery lasts at max quality and I still have 1 battery bar left. Honestly I think I'm going to buy another one because I'm that happy with it having a back up would be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive action cam
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for a less expensive action camera to try out before investing in something more expensive like a GoPro or Osmo. Comes with a ton of accessories. Pretty good for an action camera that’s less than $100. Update: after a few months we started getting a screen of static/snow when powering on. After Googling we couldn’t figure out what the issue is. Couldn’t find any info other than one other review mentioning the same thing. Was ready to accept the cam was just broken but one last effort of pressing all the buttons over and over and tapping the screen over and over and it got fixed! No idea what happened but the screen popped back on.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Video Quality
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect 4k from this camera. I didn't even expect 1080. I expected possibly 720 but what I got was closer to 144. Just horrible quality. They really should have skipped the back screen and put more into the optics because this thing is trash. It's false advertising, at its best. Even for the low price it isn't worth it at all. There are videos online showing it doing better, but honestly I don't think they are legit. This thing is a budget potato cam, avoid it unless that's what you're going for. For me, it was a complete waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Bodford

customer_reviews.title: Good option for less money
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for an action camera and not wanting to spend big bucks,then this should definitely be a consideration. It comes with many mounting options and so far I have used it on my bicycle, and have one of the mounts on my desk for a webcam. With so many mounts included I am able to snap it between the different places easily. I have tested as a dash cam and I will be trying it out kayaking next weekend. The pictures seem a little dark but can be lightened in an editor and the video seems pretty good so far. Will post an update after my kayak trip.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture Quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera has been great for my son who loves to take in the pool everyday to take pictures and videos. The customer service is also really good! A part by the battery broke and they replaced it right away when I called, no questions asked. The camera is small and comes with 2 rechargeable batteries which is nice as other water cameras we had did not and once its dead you have to go plug in. With this camera you can just go grab another battery. The batteries have their own charging station.
customer_reviews.author: Menyon

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect to phone wifi
customer_reviews.text: After hours of trying and enlisting the help of a friend who is a network engineer for a living, I was unable to connect this device to a Samsung Galaxy S8 or S8 Active. If you are planning to use any of the wifi or phone controlled features of an action camera, this is not the camera for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: 10 YEAR OLD LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.text: My Son Loved It! My 10 year old son was very excited and loves it. It took him a little while to get used to using the buttons to choose his options rather than a touch screen, but once he got the hang of it, it was easy. He took it to swim and the case worked great. Unfortunately, less than 2 weeks, the latch to the case broke and the charger stopped working. According to him, the images are nice and clear, the videos are amazing and the audio is great.
customer_reviews.author: missk

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I took this out for my 1st mountain bike ride today.. I got more battery than I expected and good video quality. For the low cost this is a bargain Built quality is better than you might expect for the low cost, don't expect it to be the same as a $500 GoPro but they do a decent job.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Feigen

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is a million times better than i expected, it is very simple to use and set up, i do wish it came with some instructions or pictures of how to use the attachments or what some of the pieces are for though. I am very excited to use this on vacation and have really high hopes for it. I love that it came with 2 batteries that you can charge simultaneously because an hour- hour and a half of usage time seems a little low to me. But in comparison to an actual gopro this is 100% the one I will be buying in the future. GoPros just aren't worth the extra money imo.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie L.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The device itself has mediocre video quality no matter the mode, and despite being advertised as a webcam will not function as such for me. Tried in multiple PCs and it won't recognize the USB device, and no updated drivers are available. Additionally the companion phone app will not function unless it has full time access to your GPS, and all of your files and photos. If you lock it down so the application only has access when the app is running, the app simply won't run, and will tell you to re-enable the permissions. Sketchy and totally unnecessary for an action cam companion app. Would not recommend this cam, or Dragon Touch in general after this experience.
customer_reviews.author: jed

customer_reviews.title: Quality/Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our upcoming trip to the Caribbean. I was quite impressed with the quality for such a bargain of a price. I look forward to using it in the water. **12/3/18–The company promised free accessories if I leave a positive feedback. I did that and followed their instructions. Still no accessories, but stated it’s on its way. It’s been a couple of weeks. If you do this, hope you’re not in a rush to receive it. The camera is still good though.
customer_reviews.author: CK1

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Picture is great. Video is great but must be in bright area but since this an action camera it is meant to be used outside anyway. I was impressed with the slowmotion feature. Thus camera has a drive mode so you can put it on your dashboard and it will record a 5 minutes loop. This way only the last 5 minutes are on your card preventing from filling it. Sound will only be recorded IF the camara is not in the waterproof case. No jack for extetnal sound pickup.
customer_reviews.author: Alain Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great video quality for a great cost!
customer_reviews.text: Love the small size for storage and convenience. The picture quality is fantastic. My 11 year old son was able to save enough money for this camera, when a goPro was out of the question and we don't think we lost much in video quality! We like the waterproof feature for underwater filming and it seals up watertight!
customer_reviews.author: J and R

customer_reviews.title: First purchase ever returned by me
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a rubbish, worst than a year 2000 2 megapixel usb webcam; Seriously, a low end cheap Android phone's front camera takes better video than this, tested and verified on PC. The video lags like hell, no way a 30fps, more like 12fps on 4K; My solution? Returned this crap and bought myself a gimble for mobile phone to record TV quality video.
customer_reviews.author: Zavvio Mok

customer_reviews.title: Won't Format Micro SD Card (SanDisk 64GB 10 Etc).
customer_reviews.text: For two days, I've been trying everything to get the Micro SD Card formatted. It certainly won't work in-camera for the unit I just received here on Maui, Hawaii. So disappointed. Will try another day or two and then return it. Should've just gone with GoPro. My Bad. * Turn On. * Tells Me To Format. * Go To "Tools". * Scroll Down To Format * Move over to "Continue". * Quickly returns. * Try to record picture or video -- it says to TF ............format the card.
customer_reviews.author: Steven K. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: For the money its worth it. the kit i got had all the accessories I wanted, even a spare battery. My only complaint is while its running in the waterproof case the sound quality is poor, but thats to be expected and also the image quality / encoding of video isn't the best, just average so if you are looking to make documentaries of your adventures to show off to friends or upload high quality utube vids you might want something more quality. I did mount it to the my quads front bumper and ran some rough trails, the image stabilization is ok, but not excellent; the videos were definitely watchable. A bargain for the price.
customer_reviews.author: JIM

customer_reviews.title: Only redeeming quality is the price.
customer_reviews.text: The camera itself isn't too bad, but the app you're forced to use is hot garbage and very temperamental. Would crash on my Google Plxel 3XL, but "worked" on my original Google Pixel XL. Wouldn't work on my friends Samsung Note 10, but working on another friends Samsung S20 Ultra. The accessories use very poor quality mounting tape, so if you want to not lose this device off the back of a car, find another way to secure it. I'm assuming this had good reviews because the company had given many away for free to positive reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Fireball

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap junk!
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Trash ok i have 3 of these cheap knock off Gopro for under $40. And a real Gopro 8. This cam has poor quality and sound! I only purchased it to put on my polaris atv in the rear. So i could mix in with the front real Gopro when off roading. All these low end so call action cameras are junk! Reason why i didn't return it. Is I'm giving it to my niece for her Birthday. To play with. Because that's all it's good for a kid to play with it do look good only if it performed like it looks.$40. What else you think the quality would be like.
customer_reviews.author: DJ-Dizzy

customer_reviews.title: Solid,  functional 4k cam
customer_reviews.text: At the deal price, this camera was a steal. The 4k quality is great. The buttons align with case for easy use and the remote does its job. The accessories are pretty plain/ standard, but useful if this is a first camera. The menu structure is a bit convoluted but manageable with practice, I guess. My primary disappointments are the sound and lack of app info for wifi function. An aux mic will fix the sound, but I'd hoped to run informal videos without it. Not sure what to do about the other issue. Structure feels solid and it fus my other accessories items and my drone mount. All in all, happy with it at the deal price.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.M. in U.S.A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Action Cam for the price!  ***WORKS WITH ZOOM***
customer_reviews.text: I needed a webcam for my business, with the rush on cams for business meetings, almost all webcams were sold out and I had to get creative. This little action cam works great, it works with Zoom and Facebook Live. I'm so happy with it I plan on using it to produce videos for my business. It comes with a great pack of accessories too. The only con I can see is a slight learning curve, but download the manual (they supply a link) and you'll be just fine. Can't be beat for the price and features!
customer_reviews.author: E. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Not a well working camera. We tried two! Both had the exact same issues.
customer_reviews.text: Charger claims batteries were charged all the way after being on a charger overnight. We tried the batteries in the cameras but they did not work in there. We also tried the first cameras batteries in the second camera and same thing, neither camera would turn on after the first days use. We charged all the batteries for another 6 hours or more. Finally we got the one of the cameras to turn on but only for 5 minutes then it turned off. I believe the batteries are not good in these cameras. We have decided to return both cameras because the charging time is much too long for usage and how unpredictable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera for the money. We don't do much in the way of "action," but I like that we are able to affordably capture memories of my crazy, wild children being themselves. For the price, I don't have to worry too much about them destroying the camera, but it seems pretty durable so far. The video quality isn't the best indoors, but we've been happy with outdoor footage. Until we're ready to spring for something fancy, this will serve us very well.
customer_reviews.author: miss G.

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am a SCUBA Diver, Director/Cinematographer, and Author/Coauthor of several diving books. I bought the (DragonTouch Vision 3 Camera) to record underwater pictures and video. It is a Perfect Camera: Fantastic Pictures & Video – Cost $40 – Charger/2 long life batteries – Underwater to 100' – 170o Wide Angle – Zoom range from 1.0X to 4.0X. – 4K and much more. Does everything a camera costing hundreds of $$$ more and thensome. Dive shop owners I deal with want to carry it. Divers who have seen my videos want to own it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald R. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Worthless do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Every time I've tried to take a video with this thing it will not play back the video. The file is there but it never comes up as a video.
customer_reviews.author: texmaster

customer_reviews.title: Great camera to capture our Alaskan adventures
customer_reviews.text: Battery life in our negative temperature up in Alaska wasn’t great but lasts much longer now that it’s above zero!! Lots of fun watching our sledding adventures!!! Came with great attachments for water floating Tri pod chest strap and helmet straps
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hubby mainly for hunting season. He wants to record as the deer approach and he gets them. He tried it in the house, in the car, and while hunting. He loves the remote to be able to start recording. We didn't want to spend a ton of money on a go pro and now he loves it so much he wants more. Only thing he couldn't figure out was how to get it to record with voice as it wasn't set up. However I figured it out in about 30 seconds. You have to change the settings with the buttons on the camera itself. Really like that this one came with batteries and charger as most don't.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The video feature works ok, however it deforms the images like a rounded camera would do. I didn't know about it until I used it. So everything in the middle looks different size than objects in the corners.... The picture quality is bad, worst than a cheap cell phone. I bought it also because I thought about using the remote control feature to take pictures but I'm not going to use it for pictures, only for video. I read other reviews so I knew battery life was not the best, not an issue with that. Each small battery lasts enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good camera
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Good quality matches price. nicely surprised by image quality of the movies. Good number of accessories. Like multiple resolutions and FSP. Cons: power button issues - takes forever to press to disconnect. Wifi connection spotty, tough to connect first time. no support for Mac, 64GB Card needs to be formatted on pc first than formatted again in the camera to work. Battery life is short Would like to see: Support for Mac, indicator on hand when camera is rolling, better wifi connection.
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Merzyn

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it even at its low purchase price. Power won’t always turn on and I’ve only had it 2 days Revise - I was contacted by seller in efforts to correct this. They are sending me another camera in hopes that this one works better. I will update as soon as the new camera arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Tony chill

customer_reviews.title: Housing failed and rendered useless
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: read below for the problems I had. Upon placing this review on Amazon, I was contacted by the company. They sent me a brand new action cam to replace mine FREE OF CHARGE. I was disappointed with the case breaking but with this kind of customer service, it is worthy of a 5 star. Video is decent but struggles in low light. Biggest problem is the plastic on the waterproof housing (and non-waterproof housing) cracked and has rendered the device useless since it cannot be mounted in it's case anymore. Purchased just over a year ago and in the process of contacting customer service. We'll see how this goes.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good for Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera specifically for the underwater aspect of it. So far, I am liking the image quality of the underwater photos. This camera does not do well in low light situations (like indoor), which is fine. Some of the features are a little odd. For example, it was difficult to put the memory card in because you have to push it in so far for it to lock in. Some of the buttons are in odd places which makes is awkward to take photos without pushing other buttons. It is a very basic camera. Overall, I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: No Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Update: 1/21/2020 I was promptly contacted by the company that makes this camera and they were exceptionally nice and accommodating. They offered to replace the camera which they suspected was defective and even gave me an upgrade to their better camera. I will review the one camera as soon as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Luca D.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a 9 year old!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 9 years old and have always wanted an action camera for bike tricks and trampoline tricks. I chopped and sold cedar kindling bundles to earn enough money and love that the camera comes with all the accessories and an extra battery! So far it has worked great and I can't wait to try it underwater in the case. I'm super excited about using it all around our house and on bike rides. The pictures look great on our computer too.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew McBride

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, one would expect to pay more for what you are getting.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera and another one almost identical to this one. Over our family vacation there was several pictures and videos shot with this camera. Picture quality is great and and video quality is also great. Unfortunately I didnt go through all the settings of this camera so I cant review the whole camera functions. I was surprised at th battery life on this camera. One battery would last all day and depending on the use sometimes two days.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan H.

customer_reviews.title: I want to buy more
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers will do a much better job at an in depth explanation why this budget action cam is awesome. I like it cuz it’s cheaper than a GoPro and does about the same things. I love being able to connect to my phone . I use it to record band sessions . Works well .
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Sesto

customer_reviews.title: very user un friendly
customer_reviews.text: instead of including an easy to read user manual or a official user manual video link, the box came with a small paper with one sentence + QR quote. Not everyone want to view everything on their phone. This company could have easily produce a "how to format the cam" video for new customer. I don't have the time and patient to search on YouTube to go thru some useless "un boxing" Vlogs to figured out how to use this new cam. I return it.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great company to work with
customer_reviews.text: This camera does NOT record in 4k. It also is NOT taking pictures at 16mp. Hands down the worst camera I've seen. I bought my son a Cars digital camera ten years ago. It took better pictures and videos than this does. Seriously. If I could give zero or negative stars, I would. EDIT: Previously I rated the camera with one star. Rebecca in their customer service department reached out to me and offered to make things right with their merchandise. It's refreshing to see a company, big or small, that will stand up and admit their mistakes. I'm more than happy to say that I was able to feel like my experience mattered.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: 4K video for under $40!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera, and I mean little because it is about the size of a matchbox. The video quality is great and the camera is easy to use. Word to the wise: Be sure to get a microSD card. A three minute 4k video is about 1G.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The first camera I received had a defective sensor making all the videos laggy and pixelated. I figured at the time that it was most likely just a low quality camera. Later I was contacted by customer support, even after amazon's return time, and was shipped a brand new updated camera (Vista 5)! The pixelation is now gone and the camera is working as designed. I can't speak highly enough on the customer service I was shown to get this problem resolved quickly. The camera itself is probably not as high quality as other name brand 4K camera's, (both in build and video quality) however this is a great starter camera, and at the fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: TheLegendaryNinja

customer_reviews.title: Useless waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: I guess in the broadest terms, this IS a camera. Wireless? Not even a little. The app that is supposed to make it usable with your phone is horrendous. Awful. Non user friendly. I wasted probably 3 hours trying to get this useless piece of "technology" to work. Absolute, and complete trash. Did come with a lot of mounting hardware which would have been awesome if the unwieldy app and interface could, ya know, get it to take actual pictures, but alas, that never came to be. If I'd been sent a solid brick of plastic, at least I wouldn't have wasted my time trying to get it to work. HIGHLY dis-recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Liam R Hudock

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera- needs a memory card.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 11 for Christmas. So far we are fairly pleased not having any experience with cameras like this. It came with accessories which we had no idea how to use and watched a YouTube video to figure out what they all meant and how to use them. We also had to order a disk for memory which wasn’t hard but we weren’t aware. Overall we are happy with this product but would have appreciated more instruction on the accessories:)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, second camera failure in six months
customer_reviews.text: First camera failed and customer service was incredibly responsible and sent me an upgraded replacement which works well. I am a satisfied customer. Six month update: the replacement camera is suddenly recording video and sound out of sync. The video portion is erratic too, it speeds up every few second and you cannot achieve a continuous smooth video playback. I reset the camera to factory setting but that did not help. Not happy at all with this useless camera.
customer_reviews.author: YD

customer_reviews.title: Good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to record my daughters travel softball games. Easy to use. Battery life lasts for about one full game continously running. Bought a large micro card to go with it. Many different choices for video quality. Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Cory S

customer_reviews.title: Affordable option
customer_reviews.text: This camera was effectively the same as that offered from other vendors but significantly less-expensive. I bought it to try out for use on my motorcycle. It did not serve well for that purpose due to poor/no image stabilization. The battery life seems a bit short, but it can be hooked up by USB power as well, so this doesn't bother me so much. The screen had a small crack on arrival. Overall I was satisfied at the inexpensive alternative to play around with before deciding if I needed/wanted something more. It came with a butt load of attachment alternatives which in and of themselves were useful for other cameras and such for my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Haining

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera!
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Loved the compact size, unobtrusive in the formal setting of a wedding and christening. Crisp clear video & photos. I actually forgot it and when i went back about 8 hrs later, it was still running so great battery life :D Had the sd card not been full i can only imagine what I would have gotten. CONS: batteries had to charge overnight on super slow charge. Battery charger is very flimsy,the charge port where the cable plugs in fell into the unit making it unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Judi  S

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this a few days ago to use while I ride my dirt bike. Comes with plenty of mounts I ended up putting 2 mounts on my helmet to see which angle I liked better unfortunately both sticky mounts came off after about an hour of riding it might have been an error on my part I’m not sure but the camera itself works really well very clear the remote is kinda weird though it doesn’t always work. But for the price it worked great. I did test the waterproof of the case and took it swimming it did just fine overall great camera for a noob would recommend getting one
customer_reviews.author: Amanda/Terry

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera For the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera for the price. If you can't afford the big name brand cameras but you are looking for a good camera that is waterproof then this is the one. I took it snorkeling and was amazed how good it worked and the quality of the pictures. The remote is NOT waterproof (learned the hard way) so do not use under water. The sound quality is not great while the camera is in the waterproof case. Not sure about how it sounds outside the case haven't tried it yet. There aren't very good instructions on how to use the camera or any of the extra pieces that come with it.
customer_reviews.author: danraoul

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price & fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: For starters, the camera is great for the PRICE. You can't expect go pro quality at this price point. I will say this is the second action cam I have purchased & for $20 more than the first the quality is crazy better! I did figure out (the hard way) if taking a time lapse & you need to do a battery change "Remember To Set The Time & Date Again!" If not, if will place the files after battery change somewhere in the mess of a few thousand images (because of time stamp). Other than that, this thing is Great!
customer_reviews.author: ltknhrk

customer_reviews.title: Nice all around camera.
customer_reviews.text: Not great battery life, but not horrible either. Didn't notice much in way of stability beyond what we normally see. Takes beautiful video for such a small camera. Sound is not best with waterproof cover...FYI for you. I knew this since we have an older model of it. Doesn't come with any instructions but we knew how to use it from old one They take nice underwater stuff and haven't had any issues with it. Comes with everything you need and more, except a memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen trout

customer_reviews.title: Great camera at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy this camera for action or sports. It's initial purchase was to record some presentations. I ordered the camera with a high speed 64gb card. The cam did a fantastic job with the picture quality and the sound was good. I will not be mounting this cam to the handle bars of my motorcycle and ordering a vision 4 for work use. This only complaint I have with this camera are the batteries that come with it. They are 1050mAh and lasted about 1.5 hours before going dead. I will order some replacement 1350mAh batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Laverick

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made. Note worth the time.
customer_reviews.text: Camera was broken on arrival. Battery charger was defective. Entire item was poorly made. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Colonel170

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this action camera when it arrived. It came with remote and a bunch of different types of mounts. The picture quality was decent but not 4k decent. The instructions were not very detailed but I was able to find instructions for everything I needed to know by searching the internet. The biggest disappointment though was that the built in microphone stopped working the second day. I'll be sending it back for a refund and trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christina G.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price. Intuitive without reading the manual. Highly recommend! Only concerns are the 4K quality and photo quality were incredibly disappointing initially when viewed on a laptop. Going to give a second go in better lighting. Took a 1080p video as a dash cam and for some reason 20 minute drive was broken up in one 18min video and last 2min another. Hopefully it looks good on a laptop. Good camera nonetheless and compatible with GoPro accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Young

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this camera
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a go pro, so I started looking into other more affordable options for a young teen. We came across this camera and were impressed by other reviews. So far so great! My son is enjoying the camera and I am surprised at the quality of the sound. We will be taking the camera to the water park today and we are excited to further test it underwater. We are happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great portable camera for travel and water
customer_reviews.text: My original camera has some issues with the lens and quality, but this unit was replaced. My replacement unit has performed much better. Quality of photos is great and I didn't have any issues with lens streaking. Lots of great accessories. I was able to take this along with me for a 3 day hike and captured tons of great shots. Battery life was great. Overall definitely nice to have this as an addition to my travel kit!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Nice Affordable Action Cam
customer_reviews.text: Obviously everyone will compare this to the GoPro type action cam and I think it does a very good job with a clear stable picture. I have it mounted to the dash of my Jeep and set up to take video in 2 minute intervals and for it to start filming when I turn it on so I don't need to fumble with any other buttons. I would recommend this action cam and have to other Jeeper's.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.

product_meta.title: Dragon Touch 4K Action Camera 16MP Vision 3 Underwater Waterproof Camera PC Webcam 170° Wide Angle WiFi Sports Cam with Remote 2 Batteries and Mounting Accessories Kit
feature_bullets: 4K ACTION CAMERA with 4X ZOOM: Professional 4K/30FPS, 2.7K/30fps, 1080P/60FPS video and 16MP photo resolution enables you to capture exciting moment for you. This action camera also features zoom range from 1.0X to 4.0X.

WIRELESS WRIST REMOTE CONTROL: Put the remote control on your wrist while installing the sports PC web camera on your helmet, convenient to record moments in places you can't reach. Wireless range up to 10m(33ft), the remote is not waterproof.

WIFI ACTION CAMERA with 2" SCREEN: Save and share your sports action camera moments on the phone/tablet with App XDV, WiFi signal ranges up to 33 feet. 2'' screen allows you to preview the video in action camera.

100FT WATERPROOF CAMERA with FREE ACCESSORIES: Place your camera into the waterproof case and securely fasten it, you can dive below 30 meters. This underwater camera is ideal for water sports such as swimming, surfing, diving, etc. This underwater camera also comes with 2 rechargeable 1050mAh batteries, charger and accessories which available for most action camera even Gopro.

VERSATILE BUT COMPACT: This action camera features multiple functions including driving mode, image rotation, time-lapse, loop recording, slow motion, dramashot, exposure and white balance. Bringing this sports camera to more applicable conditions beyond your expectation. This action camera is not Mac compatible.
